message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9000.
I'm very interested in the product, but $9000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $7500. Can we meet in the middle?
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $9000 might be a stretch for you. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $7500. How about we meet at $8200 instead?
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I was thinking more along the lines of $7000. Can we meet in the middle again?
I understand your concerns, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go as low as $7000. How about we meet at $7900 instead?
I'm still not convinced about the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think I can do $7400. Can we try to find a mutually beneficial price?
I understand your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to make another concession. How about we meet at $7800 instead?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to go up to $7500, but that's my final offer. Can we meet at $7500?
I understand your final offer, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $7500. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $7850 instead?
I'm not willing to go any higher than $7500. I'm afraid we've reached an impasse. I think I'll have to look elsewhere for the product. But thank you for the negotiation!
